movie.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
movie.writer: Rian Johnson, George Lucas (based on characters created by)
movie.actors: Tom Hardy, Gwendoline Christie, Adam Driver, Daisy Ridley
movie.plot: Having taken her first steps into a larger world in Star Wars: The Force Awakens (2015), Rey continues her epic journey with Finn, Poe and Luke Skywalker in the next chapter of the saga.
